mapper.insert: insert into reply_html (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
insert into reply_css (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
insert into reply_javascript (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
insert into reply_jsp (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
insert into reply_java (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
insert into reply_oracle (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
insert into reply_spring (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, board_category_id) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname}, #{board_category_id})
mapper.select: select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_html where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_css where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_javascript where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_jsp where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_java where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_oracle where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_spring where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
mapper.update: update reply_oracle set reply_contents = #{reply_contents}, reply_regdate_modified = sysdate() where reply_id = #{reply_id}
